nodes.text: Orn Free Taa's Twi'lek aide was a Lethan Twi'lek who served him in the Galactic Senate. Her wardrobe included a metallic, patterned dress, a dark blue cloak and a silver headpiece.

This Lethan Twi'lek served Orn Free Taa along with Pampy prior to the events of the Clone Wars. It was said that she often flirted with Orn Free Taa due to his vast wealth. In 32 BBY, she was present with Taa when Queen Amidala came to the Senate to ask for help after Naboo got invaded by the Trade Federation. However, Chancellor Finis Valorum refused. Then, senators including Taa voted Valorum out of office. Some time later, she was replaced by Supi.
This Twi'lek is meant to be Orn Free Taa's Associate Planetary Representative, much as Jar Jar Binks was to Senator Padmé Amidala in 22 BBY.[source?]
